input.sentences: it fell everywhere and covered everything
the houses and trees were covered
and the cars dissepeared into the snow
it was one big headache to dig out of this
output.sentences: John came out after work to find that his car had been blocked in by the snow plow.
It took him two hours to dig it out!
He finally got home just as the sun was about to set.
The next morning he had to enlist help, as he again found his car plowed in and covered in snow.
With help, he was off to work in only 15 minutes this time, but still swearing he was going to move south for next winter!
